name: MECH GAME I NEED TO FIND A NAME FOR - Demo 1a
name_original: MECH GAME I NEED TO FIND A NAME FOR - Demo 1a
description:
Featuring a brand new take on difficulty, where YOU choose YOUR OWN difficulty.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Spacebar/Left Ctrl: Go Up/Down

Shift:Dash

E:Block

F:Lock on to a target

V:Fix camera on target
